QuestData.Title: Avenge this Atrocity!
QuestData.Description: These so-called mage hunters came here and destroyed our resting place.$B$BAvenge us, or I will see to it that your base of operations is overrun with the spirits of the dead!
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill any combination of 15 Dragonblight Mage Hunters, Moonrest Stalkers, Surge Needle Sorcerers, and Focus Wizards. After you have done that, return to Ethenial Moonshadow at Moonrest Gardens.
QuestData.CompletionText: Somehow I sense that you haven't quite killed enough of these defilers!
QuestData.RewardText: Very well, you have satisfied my request if nothing more.$B$BThank you, $r.

Objectives.Objective: Blue Dragonflight forces at Moonrest Gardens slain
